CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV , MOT and CHI enter room . INV explains about warm-up task to MOT and leaves room
MOT sits in chair next to door while CHI is squatting down in front of wastebasket looking at book
CHI turns head and looks at door . <aft> CHI looks at book
MOT waves and looks at CHI
CHI reaches out for book . <aft> CHI moves to her right
CHI picks up book . <aft> CHI starts walking towards MOT
CHI looks at book . <aft> CHI looks at MOT
CHI continues to walk towards MOT
MOT reaches hand out towards book then pulls it back
MOT looks at CHI while reaching for the book
CHI continues to walk towards desk
<aft> CHI stops in front of desk
CHI turns around towards MOT . <aft> CHI looks at MOT
MOT reaches hand out towards book
MOT reaches hand out towards CHI
CHI reaches out for football on floor
<bef> CHI lets go of book and picks up ball . <aft> CHI puts hand on duck and squeezes it a couple of times
CHI looks at ball . <aft> CHI looks at duck
CHI turns towards car and pushes it back and forth a couple of times
CHI looks at car then around in room
<bef> CHI looks at car . CHI looks at ball
CHI lets car fall to the ground and picks up duck
CHI squeezes duck . <aft> CHI puts duck on top of car still holding onto it
CHI lets duck fall to the ground and puts hand around ball
CHI is now holding ball with both hands
CHI lets ball fall to the ground and reaches out for something under table
CHI looks at something under table
CHI picks up ball then puts it on floor and reaches out for car which she pushes forwards a little bit . CHI plays with duck . <aft> CHI drops duck and picks up the car
CHI looks at ball then at car . CHI looks around at the various toys
<bef> CHI puts ball on floor still holding onto it
CHI turns head and looks behind her
<bef> CHI gets down on hands and knees
CHI looks at something under table
CHI gets up and walks towards desk . CHI gets down on hands and knees
CHI crawls towards end of desk . <aft> CHI pulls out a piece of cardboard
CHI pulls out a piece of cardboard
MOT gets up . <aft> MOT walks towards CHI
CHI takes another thing off piece of cardboard
MOT picks up CHI . <aft> MOT places CHI on floor next to toys
<bef> CHI walks towards jack+in+the+box . CHI reaches out for jack+in+the+box . <aft> CHI plays with head of clown
<bef> MOT gets down on floor and crawls to jack+in+the+box . <aft> MOT closes lid
<aft> MOT puts clown back in box and closes top then turns crank
MOT looks at jack+in+the+box then up at CHI and then at jack+in+the+box
CHI bends over and puts hand on top
CHI has her back to camera as jack+in+the+box clown pops up
CHI lifts box up a little bit by holding onto head of jack+in+the+box clown then puts box down on floor again
MOT grabs hold of head of the clown
MOT pushes clown down in box and closes top
MOT looks up at CHI . <aft> MOT looks at jack+in+the+box
CHI squats down and starts playing with crank
CHI puts hand on top of box
CHI plays with head of jack+in+the+box clown
MOT grabs hold of top and pushes it up
<aft> MOT pushes clown down in box and closes top
<aft> MOT pushes clown back in box and closes top
MOT pushes clown back in box and closes top . <aft> MOT turns crank
MOT holds around box with one hand
CHI turns crank then puts hand on top
CHI pushes clown back in box and lets go twice
clown pops up when CHI lets go
CHI continues to play with clown
MOT straightens up . <aft> MOT gives car a push towards CHI
MOT squeezes duck then puts it down on floor . <aft> MOT picks up ball placing it next to duck . <aft> MOT gets up
CHI turns head and looks at duck then at ball
<bef> CHI looks at and points to nose of clown
CHI continues to play with jack+in+the+box
INV opens door . End of Warm-up
INV explains about Small Scale Activity to MOT then puts toys on table
MOT puts CHI in high chair and CHI starts playing
INV asks MOT to fill out forms and leaves

MOT sits in chair and fills out forms . CHI starts climbing out of chair and cries when MOT puts her back in . INV enters and CHI cries hysterically but calms down when placed in a regular chair . INV leaves and CHI plays for a while then starts crying hysterically again . MOT picks up CHI which quiets her down
INV sits down at table across from CHI and explains Forbidden Object task to MOT then puts toys away and takes out forbidden object
CHI is unhappy and gets a juice bottle and her blanket but keeps fussing . MOT who is sitting next to CHI takes CHI's shoes off
CHI looks at object while reaching for it
MOT moves CHI so CHI sits upright
MOT puts CHI hand in CHI's lap
MOT reaches out for CHI's hand
CHI looks at and points to some of the balls
MOT pushes CHI's hand away from object
CHI looks at and points to some of the balls
CHI looks at MOT . <aft> CHI looks at object
MOT reaches out for CHI's hand
MOT moves CHI's hand to CHI's lap
CHI starts to cry hysterically when forbidden object disappears but calms down when MOT picks her up and gives her a bottle
INV starts to explain about PCI boxes to MOT
CHI starts to fuss again until MOT hands her the ball
INV finishes explaining about PCI boxes and leaves
MOT places CHI on the floor
CHI looks up toward INV as she leaves
<$=1> MOT holds hands out with palms up . MOT looks at CHI
<bef> CHI looks at MOT . CHI looks down at ball
MOT rolls the ball to herself
MOT rolls the ball to CHI
CHI makes noises as if she were starting to laugh
CHI looks in the direction of desk
MOT holds hands out towards ball with palms up
MOT grabs ball and rolls it to CHI
CHI reaches out for ball and puts hands on it
CHI gets up then picks up ball and walks towards MOT
CHI holds ball up toward MOT
<bef> MOT holds hand out . MOT grabs ball
MOT presses CHI down towards floor
MOT pushes CHI back and CHI walks backwards and then sits down on floor
CHI puts hands and foot on ball
<bef> CHI lifts foot . CHI rolls ball to MOT
CHI catches ball and picks it up
CHI looks up in the direction of box on table
MOT holds hands out towards ball
MOT reaches out for box . <aft> MOT places ball on floor between them
CHI puts hand on corner of box and tilts box towards her
<aft> CHI looks at ball then at box
<1> MOT points down in box . MOT looks at CHI then at box
CHI looks at and points to letters inside box
MOT reaches out for box behind her while looking at CHI
MOT opens box . <aft> MOT takes out towel
MOT unfolds towel . <aft> MOT holds towel up in front of her so it covers all of her
MOT looks at CHI then at towel
CHI sits on the floor in front of MOT looking up at her
<bef> MOT holds towel up in front of her . MOT lowers towel
MOT lets go of towel and reaches out for box . <aft> MOT puts box on desk
CHI gets down on hands and knees . <aft> CHI crawls towards box on floor
<bef> CHI sits down and straightens up
MOT holds towel out in front of CHI
MOT lets go of towel and leans head towards CHI
CHI looks down at towel in her lap
<aft> MOT picks up towel and throws it over CHI
CHI gets down on hands and knees and crawls closer to MOT . <aft> CHI gets up and tries to pull off towel
MOT grabs CHI and puts her down on floor
<$=1> MOT holds towel up in front of herself
<bef> CHI leans forward and puts hand on floor
MOT lowers towel . <aft> MOT holds towel up in front of her then lowers it
CHI looks at box with ball
CHI holds hand out in front of her
MOT puts towel in its box
CHI holds on to edge of desk waiting for MOT to get another box down
MOT picks up box . <aft> MOT puts box on floor and opens it
<aft> MOT looks at contents of box
CHI looks at box . <aft> CHI follows box with eyes then looks in it
MOT puts a piece of paper on floor
CHI walks towards box . <aft> MOT leans forward towards box and reaches out for something in it
MOT looks at item CHI picked up
<aft> MOT rummages around in box for a crayon
CHI picks up crayon in box
<bef> MOT puts box down on floor . MOT puts hand on paper
MOT looks at crayon on CHI's hand
MOT reaches out for crayon in CHI's hand
MOT pauses between three first letters and the rest
CHI bends down leaning one hand on MOT's arm . <aft> CHI touches paper with tip of crayon
MOT stops drawing and straightens up
<aft> MOT takes paper out of box
MOT places a new piece of paper over CHI's drawing . <aft> MOT puts CHI's drawing in box
<aft> CHI follows drawing with eyes then looks at paper in front of her
CHI fidgets with paper then sits back and plays with crayon . <aft> CHI leans forward towards paper and lets tip of crayon touch paper
CHI looks back and forth from crayons to paper
<bef> MOT watches CHI . MOT looks at paper then at CHI
MOT moves paper closer to CHI
CHI fidgets with paper then straightens up and puts puts crayon in her mouth
CHI looks at paper then at crayon
MOT leans forward and pulls crayon out of CHI's mouth
CHI puts crayon in her mouth
MOT reaches hand out towards CHI
MOT pushes CHI's hand away from mouth
CHI puts crayon in her mouth
MOT pushes CHI's hand away from mouth
MOT takes crayon . <aft> MOT puts crayon in box
MOT looks at and points to paper
CHI looks at paper then at MOT
<bef> CHI looks at crayon in her hand . CHI looks at MOT
MOT moves paper closer to herself
MOT leans forward towards CHI and hugs her
MOT straightens up and offers crayon to CHI
CHI is sitting with back to camera but presumably puts crayon in mouth
MOT pulls CHI's hand away from CHI's mouth
MOT's speech is drowned out by CHI's screams
CHI reaches out for crayon on paper
MOT puts crayons and paper back in the box
MOT first puts box on desk then places it on top of box with ball
end of PCI- Crayons and Paper
MOT looks at contents of box
MOT takes book out of box and shows it to CHI
MOT looks at CHI as she holds the book out toward CHI
MOT looks at book then at CHI
MOT points to picture in book and looks at CHI then at picture
MOT looks at CHI . <aft> MOT looks at picture
MOT puts box that was on her lap down on floor
MOT leans forward towards CHI and lets go off book
<4-5> higher pitched than the previous words
MOT turns book so cover is facing CHI
MOT looks at and points to picture on cover
<bef> CHI looks at picture MOT points to
MOT points to picture on cover
MOT moves book back and forth
MOT looks at and points to item
MOT looks at and points to picture on page
MOT looks at and points to item on page
MOT looks at and points to item
CHI looks up . CHI points to something on wall
MOT turns head and looks in the direction CHI points
MOT turns torso towards book box
MOT looks at boxes on table
CHI crawls towards MOT's legs . CHI looks at book
CHI stands up and reaches out for book
<aft> MOT puts book on floor next to her
MOT places CHI in her lap
MOT holds book so CHI can see pictures
CHI looks in the direction of wastebasket then at pages
<5> MOT starts to turn page . <aft> MOT turns page
CHI looks at and points to boxes on table . <aft> CHI looks at pages
MOT turns head and looks at boxes
MOT looks at and points to items
MOT looks at and points to items
MOT looks at and points to picture on page
MOT holds hands out with palms up
MOT takes book and turns it around
<$=2> MOT moves book up and down
MOT looks at CHI then at CHI
CHI leans forward and pushes book towards herself
book slides down a little bit and opens up
CHI grabs book and pulls it up
<aft> CHI looks in the direction of wastebasket
CHI looks at book then at MOT
MOT holds book out in front of CHI
MOT looks at book then at CHI . <aft> MOT looks at book box
CHI slides down from MOT's lap
MOT helps CHI get off her lap
MOT reaches out for box on top of box with ball
CHI looks at box with ball
MOT moves top box on table to desk
MOT puts book in its box
CHI watches MOT put book in box
CHI looks at something on desk and points to box with ball
MOT reaches out for box with ball . <aft> MOT tilts box so CHI can look inside
MOT puts box on floor next to her
MOT starts to take ball out of box
MOT holds hands out towards ball
CHI squats down and puts ball on floor
MOT gives ball a push towards herself with finger
CHI picks up ball and walks towards desk
CHI walks towards MOT with ball
ball bounces a couple of times and rolls under chair
CHI lifts foot as if to kick ball
CHI bends down and picks up ball
CHI straightens up . <aft> CHI walks straight ahead
CHI turns towards MOT . CHI looks at MOT
CHI lets ball fall to the ground
CHI points to something on the table
CHI reaches out with both hands and moves closer to desk
MOT puts an arm around CHI
MOT places CHI in her lap
MOT picks up ball and drops it
<bef> MOT picks up ball and drops it
<bef> MOT drops ball . <aft> MOT picks up ball
MOT does not catch ball and ball rolls away
CHI gets down on hands and knees
CHI picks up ball and straightens up
MOT holds hands out towards CHI
MOT lifts CHI up in the air . <aft> MOT kisses CHI
MOT puts CHI down on floor
